statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ -5 \\ 20 \\ -4 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 2 \\ -12 \\ 9 \\ 12 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
